definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
Baiyin district of Baiyin city 白銀市|白银市[Bai2 yin2 shi4], Gansu
valuable book decorated with silver, gold and jewels etc, commonly regarded as a disguised form of bribe

sentences.english: A new method to recover silver from silver-bearing waste catalytic agent is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了從含銀的廢催化劑中回收白銀的一種新方法。

sentences.english: He made his money speculating on the London gold and silver markets.
sentences.chinese: 他在倫敦黃金市場和白銀市場上進行投機買賣。

sentences.english: Baiyin Is China's largest and most varieties of non-ferrous metal industrial base.
sentences.chinese: 白銀是我國目前規模最大的多品種有色金屬工業基地。

sentences.english: As in gold, long-term silver chart also suggests caution.
sentences.chinese: 和黃金一樣，白銀的長期趨勢圖也提示我們保持謹慎。

sentences.english: I would prefer one just on relative value, silver is probably better.
sentences.chinese: 按相對估傎的標準選擇的話，白銀可能更好。

sentences.english: In 2001, he held a personal exhibition in Baiying city Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 2001年在甘肅白銀市舉辦個人畫展。

sentences.english: Song Yuan time, becomes in the Chinese currency history the silver monetization crucial phase.
sentences.chinese: 宋元時期，成爲中國貨泉史上白銀貨泉化的關頭時期。

sentences.english: It cannot be gotten for gold, neither shall silver be weighed for the price thereof.
sentences.chinese: 智慧非用黃金可得，也不能平白銀爲它的價值。

sentences.english: Silver moved to new highs but encountered a very long-term resistance level.
sentences.chinese: 白銀雖然創出歷史高點，但是也遭遇了強大的阻力。

sentences.english: In fact, the physical ratio of silver to gold in the earth’s crust is 16 to 1.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，白銀和黃金在地殼中含量之比爲16:1。

sentences.english: A German alchemist tried to transmute silver into gold.
sentences.chinese: 一位德國的鍊金術士試圖將白銀煉成黃金。

sentences.english: Silver plummeted to a seven-month low, before rallying slightly.
sentences.chinese: 白銀價格創七個月新低，隨後小幅上揚。

sentences.english: Silver is forming a strong technical pattern along with Gold and also forming a pennant.
sentences.chinese: 與黃金形成三角旗一樣，白銀形成強勢技術圖形。

sentences.english: Since building up a country, Bai Yin City is that national economic development has made gigantic contribution out.
sentences.chinese: 建國以來，白銀市爲國家經濟建設做出了巨大的貢獻。

sentences.english: This made a big difference in the PHLX Gold and Silver Sector Index, traded on the Philadelphia Stock Exchange.
sentences.chinese: 費城證交所的黃金白銀指數走勢卻截然相反。

sentences.english: Silver declined with gold yesterday but it lost more in percentage terms.
sentences.chinese: 白銀隨黃金下跌，但以損失百份比更多。

definition: to sell/to reach (a price in an auction)
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
faucet/water tap/bicycle handle bar/chief (esp. of gang)/boss/decision maker/(market) leader (of companies)/front end of mud-flow/figurehead on prow of dragon boat 龍船|龙船
to flee from danger/to avoid danger/to minimize risk/(finance) hedge
